@pixi/particle-container > PIXI > ParticleRenderer

PIXI.ParticleRenderer 

class ParticleRenderer extends PIXI.ObjectRenderer

Renderer for Particles that is designer for speed over feature set.

Constructor

new PIXI.ParticleRenderer(renderer: PIXI.Renderer) â†’ {}
Parameters:
Name Type Description
renderer PIXI.Renderer

The renderer this sprite batch works for.

The WebGL state in which this renderer will work.

Stub method that should be used to empty the current batch by rendering objects now.
